titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend from one year to two years the period during which veterans with service-connected disabilities may apply for National Service Life Insurance.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/8/1987--Introduced. Extends from one to two years the period during which eligible service-disabled veterans may apply for National Service Life Insurance.
